name: Vessels (xPheRe)
description:
I'm but a shadow of what I was, but I managed to escape from death when I had the chance. Now I'm just a wandering spirit. Not even that, because I can't move on my own. But oh boy, those idiot humans look like empty vessels to me, I can enter their bodies and get their help to fulfill my quest. Just hope they don't see me possessing one!

First I'll get back my body and then... I'll take on the world!
